text:
Twelvefold is a Big Data-driven, real-time marketing platform that reaches audiences through relevant content, versus cookies.

We are looking for a highly-motivated, devops-minded Systems Engineer to join our small but growing Technical Operations team and help us expand our infrastructure and streamline our operations. Technical Operations is responsible for all of the equipment within our datacenters, from networking to servers to storage administration. Remote work is a possibility for this role.

Ideal candidates enjoy having exposure to a wide range of technology and want to use automation and devops practices to conquer Big Data challenges.

For more details and to apply, please visit our site:

http://twelvefold.atsondemand.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=51268...
